keywords.value: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China

lead_paragraph: Ma Jian, a former vice minister of the Ministry of State Security, took bribes and used his position to help a relative, the authorities said.
snippet: Ma Jian, a former vice minister of the Ministry of State Security, took bribes and used his position to help a relative, the authorities said....

headline.main: China Says It Will Prosecute Ex-Security Official in Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: China Says It Will Prosecute  Ex-Official in Bribery Case
